passenger.name: passenger
passenger.code:
[before] [/before] [after]
Passengers
Name Gender Age Nationality Location Time Price Paid Mobile # Address
{@name} {@gender} {@age} {@nationality} {@pu_loc} {@pu_time} {@price} {@paid} {@mobile} {@address}
[/after]

plan.name: plan
plan.code:

Bookings

[/if] [if post_title]
Plan
{@post_title}
[/if] [if driver]
Driver
{@driver}
[/if] [if plan_date]
Date
{@plan_date,wordpress_plugin_planner_fmt_date}
[/if] [if pu_loc]
Location
{@pu_loc}
[/if] [if pu_time]
Time
{@pu_time}
[/if] [if flight]
Flight
{@flight}
[/if] [if vehicle]
Vehicle
{@vehicle}
[/if] [if contact_name]
Contact Name
{@contact_name}
[/if] [if contact_phone]
